feed.title: Why soft-forks? was: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!

entry.title: Why soft-forks? was: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!
entry.summary: The speaker poses a question regarding the purpose of doing things a certain way in the Bitcoin industry. Despite there being clear and explicit downsides, they want to know where the gain is for ordinary Bitcoin users. The speaker is looking for a direct answer to this question.
